en: One of Dominique's criticisms concern design - it's well below par. While he respects that you did the work on your own, he requests you find a reputable designer to update things.
You find two candidates you like, but there's a major difference between them - the price.
One is an up-and-comer with little experience and a $300 price tag, while the other is reputable, good at meeting deadlines, and priced to match at $500. Which do you choose?
You choose the reliable, experienced graphic designer. New talent is great, but now might not be the time to go with someone without a proven track record.
No need to spend more than you have to - and you're giving a fresh face spotlight!
